thread.title: A Tribe Called Quest Rages Against 'President Agent Orange' At the Grammys | The Daily Dot
thread.title_full: A Tribe Called Quest Rages Against 'President Agent Orange' At the Grammys | The Daily Dot

author: Kahron Spearman
title: A Tribe Called Quest Rages Against 'President Agent Orange' At the Grammys | The Daily Dot
text:
Screengrab via Ti Brown/Youtube BTW 
In one of the best performances of the 2017 Grammys , A Tribe Called Quest went for full inclusion and all-out resistance, performing the political hit single ‚ÄúWe The People.‚Äù Tribe just saved the #GRAMMYs ‚Äî Todd McShay (@McShay13) February 13, 2017 Tribe called quest awesome performance"power 2 the people"! pic.twitter.com/TQMd9N3mTa ‚Äî KLA$$EN (@ruckus_4_life) February 13, 2017 The band was joined onstage by a chorus of multi-ethnic people dressed like refugees, Busta Rhymes, and Consequence. For his part, Busta called Donald Trump ‚ÄúPresident Agent Orange.‚Äù A Tribe Called Quest, Busta Rhymes and Anderson .Paak deliver politically charged performance at the #GRAMMYs https://t.co/NrDeSEvovh pic.twitter.com/hsEUCKRwF8 ‚Äî Hollywood Reporter (@THR) February 13, 2017 
Anderson .Paak‚Äôs ‚Äúxxx‚Äù was cut into the performance, showcasing the young artist doing his Phil Collins/Don Henley take, as he simultaneously sang and played drums. Anderson .Paak on this Tribe set? pic.twitter.com/gPyu44nLk0 ‚Äî The Undefeated (@TheUndefeated) February 13, 2017 Every time I see Tribe I remember:1. How amazing they are2. How sad I am Phife is gone ‚Äî Chris Cillizza (@TheFix) February 13, 2017 Busta Rhymes called Trump "President Agent Orange" üòÇ We The People is right! Thank you, Tribe called Quest! #Grammys #TheResistance pic.twitter.com/tg4mr7GpZt ‚Äî Mate√≤ ‚ùÑÔ∏èüåà (@frazzledmarbles) February 13, 2017 ‚ÄúResist! Resist! Resist!,‚Äù exclaimed Q-Tip in closing. hey @TomiLahren what do you think of the tribe called quest performance? excited to hear your very thoughtful thoughts tomorrow :)
